main event: A bright light with a red glow, moving slowly, was observed for about 30 minutes. The object appeared to be around 150 feet on the horizon and disappeared about 7 feet in diameter.
interesting points: The witness was going out to see about the dog when they noticed the object while going out the back door.
The witness estimated the object to be around 4,000 feet in altitude.
The witness was a retired pilot and had been serving as a pilot for years.
The witness was unsure what the object was, but described it as a 'bright light with red flashing lights'.
The witness reported the sighting in March 1961.
